description: This file defines a JavaScript module that provides an API interface for template operations, exporting methods to list, get, create, update, and remove templates via HTTP requests.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Fetches a list of templates with optional query parameters.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific template by ID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new template with provided data.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing template identified by ID with new data.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes a template based on its ID.
